long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install the Google Chrome extension to quickly view the Data History of listings, agents and offices on REALTOR.ca.  This extension is intended for real estate board staff and technical support teams for troubleshooting their uploads and creating support tickets.
